query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST950N AS A USING ( SELECT ARA ,BSU ,COUNT(A.PJT) AS ISQ FROM ( SELECT A.PJT ,A.HNO ,A.IGD ,A.ISD ,A.IKD ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > '' THEN B.CS157_CAB ELSE A.ARA END ARA ,CASE WHEN A.IKD > '' THEN B.CS157_CHB ELSE A.BSU END BSU
FROM ( SELECT CS101_PJT PJT ,CS101_HNO HNO ,MAX(CS101_ARA) ARA ,MAX(CS101_BSU) BSU ,MAX(CS101_IGD) IGD ,MAX(CS101_ISD) ISD ,MIN(CS157_IKD) IKD
FROM SAPHEE.ZCST101 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS101_PJT = B.CS157_PJT AND A.CS101_HNO = B.CS157_HNO AND B.CS157_IKD >= A.CS101_ISD
WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CS101_IGD BETWEEN SUBSTR(#GDATE# ,1,4)||'0101' AND #GDATE# AND SUBSTR(A.CS101_HNO,1,1) IN ('L','S','W','C') AND CS101_PJT NOT LIKE 'M%' AND MDATE <= #GDATE# AND CS101_ARA != ''
GROUP BY CS101_PJT,CS101_HNO
) A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST157 B ON B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = B.CS157_PJT AND A.HNO = B.CS157_HNO AND A.IKD = B.CS157_IKD
) AS A
GROUP BY ARA, BSU
) AS B ON A.ARA = B.ARA AND A.BSU = B.BSU AND A.YYYYMM = #YYYYMM# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
WHEN MATCHED THEN
UPDATE SET ISQ = B.ISQ
